member.name: ADMINISTRATOR_POWER_POLICY
member.summary: Represents the administrator override power policy settings.

member.name: ADMINISTRATOR_POWER_POLICY.MinSleep
member.summary: The minimum system power sleep state. This member must be one of the enumeration type values betweenPowerSystemSleeping1 (power state S1) andPowerSystemHibernate (power state S4).

member.name: ADMINISTRATOR_POWER_POLICY.MaxSleep
member.summary: The maximum system power sleep state. This member must be one of the enumeration type values betweenPowerSystemSleeping1 (power state S1) andPowerSystemHibernate (power state S4).

member.name: ADMINISTRATOR_POWER_POLICY.MinVideoTimeout
member.summary: The minimum allowable video idle time-out before turning the display device off, in seconds.

member.name: ADMINISTRATOR_POWER_POLICY.MaxVideoTimeout
member.summary: The maximum allowable video idle time-out before turning the display device off, in seconds.

member.name: ADMINISTRATOR_POWER_POLICY.MinSpindownTimeout
member.summary: The minimum allowable disk idle time before flushing the cache manager and spinning down a hard disk device, in seconds.

member.name: ADMINISTRATOR_POWER_POLICY.MaxSpindownTimeout
member.summary: The maximum allowable disk idle time before flushing the cache manager and spinning down a hard disk device, in seconds.
